Store owner:
Hello, and welcome to Tools and Things!

Store owner:
We have a special offer available only today. Everybody gets a free jumpsuit! They are available in three colors. Which color would you like?

Store owner:
Which color would you like?

Store owner:
The orange jumpsuit will protect you from fire and heat. Would you like this color?

Store owner:
The blue jumpsuit will protect you from radiation and hazardous chemicals. Would you like this color?

Store owner:
The green jumpsuit will offer some protection from melee damage. Would you like this color?

Store owner:
Sorry, but we are actually completely out of this color. Go ahead and pick a different color.

Store owner:
Here you go, a blue jumpsuit. Thank you and come again!
